import React from "react"; import { Card, CardBody } from "reactstrap"; import { Link, link } from "react-router-dom"; const ToursCard = ({ tour }) => { const { id, title, city, photo, price, featured, avgRating, reviews } = tour; return (
Featured
{city} {avgRating}
{title}
${price} /per person
); }; export default ToursCard;
